alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 11:37AM CST until March 14 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and at Cairo .Minor flooding continues along the Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and at Cairo. Water levels are expected to begin a slow fall, falling below flood stage at both locations early next week. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 43.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 43.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
